title: Cisco Courts SMB/SMEs with Simplified WLAN Controller and Analytics
text: September 15, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Report Ciscoâ€™s Mobility Express and CMX 10.2 targets SMB/SMEs that Cisco already serves with its Meraki product line. Simplified licensing, deployment and management coupled with advanced capabilities will appeal to SMB/SMEs.
